channel.title: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?
channel.description: Dear All, I read that Whonix prevents keystroke loging. I think that Whonix prevents keystroke loging when using Tor. Please do you know if - it is possible to install and use Firefox or Brave? - if Whonix prevents keystroke loging when using Firefox or Brave?

item.title: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
If it’s a well known feature, then it can be easily discovered using search engines in the Whonix wiki.

Read full topic
item.source: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?

item.title: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?
item.dc:creator: auie
item.description:
Thank you very much Patrick.
If I asked, it is because the whonig dot org website is way too long for me.
I’ve been looking in it and I didn’t find anything.
I’ve been thinking that it is a well known property of Whonix for the Whonix users; this is why I simply asked.

Read full topic
item.source: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?

item.title: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I recommend to check the original sources. In this case, original source would be the whonix.org website (wiki).

  • If it’s said in Whonix wiki and needs clarification: Please ask here.
  • If it’s said elsewhere: Disregard.

Read full topic
item.source: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?

item.title: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?

item.description:
Thank you very much Patrick for your answer!
I read that “Whonix operating system prevents keystroke logging by malware residents on the users’ system.” in
javatpoint dot com/best-secure-operating-system

item.title: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
auie:

I read that Whonix prevents keystroke loging.

auie:

I think that Whonix prevents keystroke loging when using Tor.

  • Please read again.
  • Citation required.
auie:

it is possible to install and use Firefox or Brave?

See:

Whonix – 28 Mar 22

Install Additional Software Safely

Installing additional Software on Whonix ™. Safety considerations.

Whonix – 12 Mar 22

Tor Browser Essentials

Using Tor Browser in Whonix ™. Anonymity vs Pseudonymity, HTTPS Everywhere, Torbutton, Protection against dangerous JavaScript, NoScript, Tips, Update Tor Browser, Browser Plugins, Change Language

Read full topic
item.source: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?

item.title: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?
item.dc:creator: auie
item.description:
Dear All,
I read that Whonix prevents keystroke loging.
I think that Whonix prevents keystroke loging when using Tor.
Please do you know if

  • it is possible to install and use Firefox or Brave?
  • if Whonix prevents keystroke loging when using Firefox or Brave?

Read full topic
item.source: Do Whonix prevents keystroke loging on Firefox?
